summary:
Tobacco is a plant with many species, mainly used to make cigarettes, cigars, and other smoking products. The most popular type is *Nicotiana tabacum*. Dried tobacco leaves contain nicotine, which is highly addictive.

People have been using tobacco for a long time, but it's also known to cause serious health problems, including heart, liver, and lung diseases, as well as cancer. The World Health Organization considers tobacco use the leading preventable cause of death globally.
title: Tobacco
